name: Polling System

version-history.notes: Replaced query property `PminBothFull´ by probability-one assertion property `PminBothFullIsOne´.

author: Michaela Klauck <klauck@depend.uni-saarland.de>
description: A polling system with two stations and a server. The station delivers jobs out of its queue with capacity `C´ to the server which completes the tasks. Each job is of one of `JOB_TYPES´ different types. The original model was translated from a MAPA file.

properties.name: PminBothFullIsOne
properties.description: The minimum probability that both queues are full is one.

properties.name: TminBothFull
properties.description: The minimum expected time until both queues are full.

properties.name: TmaxBothFull
properties.description: The maximum expected time until both queues are full.
